‘mema siddhin padanam karagena pawath wu parikshanayedi meheyawana lada sakshi saha haras prashna mangin penwa di athi karunuda, danwim lath parshwayan (wagauththarakaruwan) wenuwen idiripath karana lada likhitha sala kirim da yana siyalla salaka bala eki sakshi mema komishan sabhawa wisin ihatha wisthara karana lada aakarayata wishleshanaya kirimen pasuwa palamuwani danwimlath parshwaya wana anura siriwardhanada, thunwani danwimlath parshwaya wana upali ranjith da, hatharawani danwimlath parshwaya wana dulip wikramasiinha da, hayawani danwimlath parshwaya wana mahinda rajapaksha da allas panathe 70 wani waganthiyehi wisthara kara athi ‘dushanaya’ namathi warada, dushanayata kumanthranaya kirime warada, dushanayata anubala dime warada aadi waradi ekak ho eeta wada wadi gananak sidu kara athi bawa mema komishan sabhawe thiranayayi.’
